channel.title: Serve-Scape Reborn
channel.description:
EDIT: I will have pictures by tomorrow :) also I am the only one working on this Dev :)
Well i though since I didn't have as much HW as i thought i would have. So i am going to start on a server again :)
[code]Little history: Serve-Scape was made in 2008 and hosted for about a year :P I had 45+ people on almost all the time. CZAR based- it lagged at like 50 people :| just AllStar i didn't know what i was doing then[/code]
[code]What's new: WL based with many updates for stability :) better skills not all chopped up and made with bad processed timers, going to try to add full castle wars and dual arena, better COMBAT needed badly since WL v.3 had only pvnpc magic and basic range and melee. [/code] [code]Update List: TPC Removed with S and L fixed ty ramli. PVP magic most spells I think 17 are missing for normal and that's it. PVP magic muti spells all hit in a 4 square area. RCing same from WL v.3 but a lot better goes up to 10X now and all portals out work for all alters I know RangeHandler added but deleted going to re add when I feel like fixing range again The bytebuffer is now set to a lower number 1m is to high :P Trade scam fixed now you can't decline fast or x log to scam people :) Range arrow fix they now show up as the amount you have and not 190 it was to easy to fix :P working Defence for PVP and PVNPC I think :S I used a tut :P Banded users and ip's can now be banned :)[/code]
[code]Credit's some people are on different forums: Me ramli Graham Java' Mrs. Extorl Limited Rune-Age maker? l3br0n20 Exorecheese? some spells and start for PVP magic[/code]
Total time spent working and playing :P: 6H
Pictures: None Yet :( I have to take a bunch for you guys

item.title: Serve-Scape Reborn
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Thanks for the support I am going to need it >.> I got a lot of work.

EDIT: well ill get pictures for tomorrow my computer is being a bitch right now and ya…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 01, 2009, 11:52:37 am[/size][hr]lock please I have to continue on this on a later date I just have to much HW and Project’s to work on this and keep it updated also I do have pictures, but when i try to upload them my computer goes hay wire and I have the slightest clue of what’s wrong. I will make a new dev blog once i get my life under control I also have many family matters to contend with also so I am sorry

Read full topic

item.title: Serve-Scape Reborn
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

hey I also played to test stuff I fixed the NPC click 2 for trading with npc’s for the shops but when i re added TPC and messed up and got mad I deleted it so ya i have to figure out how I fixed it and the S and L for TPC I thank god ramli was able to help me with it and it was so simple to fix >.< I did almost the same thing but i didn’t add the right stuff for it

Read full topic

item.title: Serve-Scape Reborn
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

EDIT: I will have pictures by tomorrow also I am the only one working on this Dev

Well i though since I didn’t have as much HW as i thought i would have. So i am going to start on a server again

Little history: Serve-Scape was made in 2008 and hosted for about a year :P I had 45+ people on almost all the time. CZAR based- it lagged at like 50 people :| just AllStar i didn't know what i was doing then

What's new: WL based with many updates for stability :) better skills not all chopped up and made with bad processed timers, going to try to add full castle wars and dual arena, better COMBAT needed badly since WL v.3 had only pvnpc magic and basic range and melee.

Update List: TPC Removed with S and L fixed ty ramli. PVP magic most spells I think 17 are missing for normal and that's it. PVP magic muti spells all hit in a 4 square area. RCing same from WL v.3 but a lot better goes up to 10X now and all portals out work for all alters I know RangeHandler added but deleted going to re add when I feel like fixing range again The bytebuffer is now set to a lower number 1m is to high :P Trade scam fixed now you can't decline fast or x log to scam people :) Range arrow fix they now show up as the amount you have and not 190 it was to easy to fix :P working Defence for PVP and PVNPC I think :S I used a tut :P Banded users and ip's can now be banned :)

Credit's some people are on different forums: Me ramli Graham Java' Mrs. Extorl Limited Rune-Age maker? l3br0n20 Exorecheese? some spells and start for PVP magic

Total time spent working and playing :P:
6H

Pictures:
None Yet I have to take a bunch for you guys

Read full topic
